body_content.explanation: the state of being partly, but not completely brought under human control:
examples: Efforts to domesticate the reindeer in East Asia have not seen success, resulting in semi-domestication at best.
The elephants are bred and raised in semi-domestication, allowed to roam in state-owned nature preserves.
Semidomestication may have promoted the growth of specific species that were uncommon in the wild but encouraged to grow when they did occur.
